project.name: NaGa-OX - Small Php Ads Server
project.description:
NaGa-OX (Not as Good as OpenX)
NaGa-OX is a php script that acts as an ads server for small to medium companies that needs to show banners in their website. Why?
I needed a custom system to handle banners for a small company. OpenX, while undoubtly better than NaGa-OX (thus the name), is very complex and aimed toward very large sites or companies with multiples clients. I needed something far more simple, for a small company with, mainly, internal promotional banners. Features
Banners can be grouped and alternated without page refreshing, each banner in a group will mantain its individual expiration and flags Dinamical banner generation, you'll never need to update the code on the webpage and still modify the displayed banners in the backend Keeps track of click and impression of each banner regardless of the group Never empty, if all of the banners are overdue or flagged as suspended, a default banner is shown. Ajax web2.0 admin panel Jquery runs in no conflict mode, this means that you can still use another java library without any problem
